mapper.sql: select p.id, p.user_id, u.user_name, p.instance_id, i.name as instance_name, p.node_id, n.name as node_name, p.permission_type, p.can_view, p.can_start, p.can_stop, p.can_restart, p.can_console, p.can_file, p.can_config, p.can_delete, p.console_cmd_whitelist, p.console_cmd_blacklist, p.file_path_whitelist, p.file_path_blacklist, p.expire_time, p.status, p.create_by, p.create_time, p.update_by, p.update_time, p.remark from sys_user_mc_instance p left join sys_user u on p.user_id = u.user_id left join node_minecraft_server i on p.instance_id = i.id left join node_server n on p.node_id = n.id
mapper.select: select distinct instance_id from sys_user_mc_instance where user_id = #{userId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now())
select distinct instance_id from sys_user_mc_instance where user_id = #{userId} and node_id = #{nodeId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now())

select count(*) from sys_user_mc_instance where user_id = #{userId} and instance_id = #{instanceId} and status = '0' and (expire_time is null or expire_time > now()) and ( (#{permission} = 'view' and can_view = 1) or (#{permission} = 'start' and can_start = 1) or (#{permission} = 'stop' and can_stop = 1) or (#{permission} = 'restart' and can_restart = 1) or (#{permission} = 'console' and can_console = 1) or (#{permission} = 'file' and can_file = 1) or (#{permission} = 'config' and can_config = 1) or (#{permission} = 'delete' and can_delete = 1) or (#{permission} = 'admin' and permission_type = 'admin') )
mapper.delete: delete from sys_user_mc_instance where id in #{id}
